    • Method Detail

      • refreshPoseMatrix

        public void refreshPoseMatrix()
        Equivalent to (n-1)T(n) = TransZ(n-1)(dn) * RotZ(n-1)(theta) * TransX(n)(r) * RotX(alpha)

      • renderModel

        public void renderModel(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl2)
        Render the model in a D-H chain. Changes the current render matrix! Clean up after yourself!
        Parameters:
        gl2 - the render context

      • renderBones

        public void renderBones(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl2)
        Render the "bone" for one link in a D-H chain. Changes the current render matrix! Clean up after yourself!
        Parameters:
        gl2 - the render context

      • renderAngles

        public void renderAngles(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl2)
        Render the min/max/current angle for one link in a D-H chain. Changes the current render matrix! Clean up after yourself!

        gl2 - the render context

      • getAdjustableValue

        public double getAdjustableValue()
        In any DHLink there should only be one parameter that changes in value. Return that value.
